aircraft.value: Wasp Interceptor - AC-6151-422 at Regional Depot-B

defect_observed.value: Autopilot disengagement without warning. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Electronic Warfare component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 07/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 08/10/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 12/10/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 12/10/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 17/10/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
